original_body_lines: My Beauty Tips feature has turned out to be quite popular with readers, with many of them expressing their keenness to contribute their beauty tips knowledge, for the benefit of readers.
Why not! A great idea, indeed, and so I thought I give those enthusiastic readers the opportunity to be active in this scene.
Sumedi Rathnayake is from Ratnapura and had her own dance troupe where beauty played a vital role, and it was Sumedi who did the needful.
She will be in the spotlight, for a while, in our Beauty Tips feature, and her first contribution is…
Cut the tomato in half and scoop out the inside with a spoon and put it in a bowl.
Add two tablespoons of sugar and half a lemon to the mixture.
You can do this mask about two or three times a week and, before long, you will see your skin having a lot more luminosity, and full of radiance.
